body: Qué bien otro capítulo más, y esta vez fue con todo jejejeje, no la dejo respirar y se la mando a guarda, ahora esperemos ver el próximo capitulo y que le siga dando a la "Mamá".
@L0k123 - Another title to add to the disappointing endings bin *Sigh*

http://boards.4chan.org/h/thread/4826562/homestay-predictions

There are four preview pics of ch.8 all in all

@metroid It's ending with chapter 8... digital version coming out on 12th January
But it's a really shitty ending because it feels way too rushed, i know it took forever for this series but the ending is still shit...it needs an after story of some between chapters, but that will probably never happen
Btw the paper version is out since the 14th December 

Oh and Tengoro will also be continued this year, maybe this one won't be complete shit

Have a good one sirs

@uwe996 It's quite ironic that you are using a racist word while criticizing others for being racist. So are u trolling or are u  just that stupid? Leaving that aside  I hope that this series gets  completed within this year. This has been going on  far too long.  And there is also the Tengoro series that needs an ending.
why does that dude looks like the Moa statue on the easter island?
